parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if there is a linked and enabled flashlight on a given weapon.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''isFlashlightOn''' weapon

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> weapon: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[isFlashlightOn]] ([[currentWeapon]] [[player]]);
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableGunLights]]
</value></part></template></root>
